name: Terminal Hacker - Expanded
description:
Welcome to Terminal Hacker!

First things first, credit: Udemy - Complete C# Unity Developer 2.0 course

Now if you know this course I have taken the essence and have tried to expand and give it that certain twist to hopefully ensure it is like no one else's.

If you have any advice, criticisms, suggestions or general feedback for my game please say! 

Enjoy.

Saul, a hopeful future Game Dev.
